meaningMnemonic: An "<kanji>add</kanji> <kanji>damp</kanji>ness <kanji>container</kanji>" is a container that adds dampness to the air. That's a <vocabulary>humidifier</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
